title: Weather app
description: The 'Weather app' project showcases a dynamic web application crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to effortlessly retrieve real-time weather information. Leveraging API integration, it delivers accurate weather updates for any location. What sets it apart is its responsive design, ensuring a seamless experience across various devices.

title: Text to Speech
description: The 'Text to Speech Converter' project is a versatile web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to easily convert text into speech. Its user-friendly interface and seamless functionality make it a valuable tool for various purposes. What's more, it boasts a responsive design, ensuring a consistent experience across different devices.

title: Restaurant Webpage
description: The 'Restaurant Webpage' project is an interactive platform crafted using the React framework, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides visitors with a delightful experience as they explore the restaurant's menu, reviews, and contact information.The webpage is designed to be fully responsive, ensuring optimal usability on a wide range of devices.
